entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.4°C

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
